articles.title: Sneakers designed by Virgil Abloh fetch $25m, with one pair going for $350,000 - The Guardian
articles.description: Two hundred pairs of Louis Vuitton and Nike Air Force 1 shoes smashed expectations in Sotheby’s online auction
articles.content:
An auction of 200 pairs of the Louis Vuitton and Nike Air Force 1 sneakers created by late American designer Virgil Abloh have fetched a total of $25m, Sothebys said.
